NeedDef.label: fire
NeedDef.description: Pyromaniacs have a need to start or watch fires. They feel happy if they are allowed to regularly do so, but very unhappy if they go for a long time without doing so.

li.label: extinguished
li.description: There's no warmth, no light. I feel cold and empty.

li.label: sputtering
li.description: I desperately need a spark in my life, something to ignite my soul.

li.label: flickering
li.description: I need the comfort of an open flame. I'm anxious and nervous without them.

li.label: glowing
li.description: There's a flame in my heart. I feel calm.

li.label: burning
li.description: My soul is full of warmth. I feel happy.
